channel.title: 667 Npc's attacking back?
channel.description: So when I have a spawned npc most of the time they will not attack me back. Like QBD In The source.. I just added Party Demon and he wont attack back unless I spawn him. Help please..? I believe I must make him move, But how do I change that?

item.title: 667 Npc's attacking back?
item.dc:creator: @coolmax763 coolmax763
item.description:
@coolmax763 wrote:

So when I have a spawned npc most of the time they will not attack me back. Like QBD In The source… I just added Party Demon and he wont attack back unless I spawn him. Help please…? I believe I must make him move, But how do I change that?
